content: The paper aeroplane flies back without hitting Nolitusne, and he makes a face at you.
Nolitusne: You won the last paper plane, I'm going to challenge you! This time I will fly farther than you!
On the spur of the moment, you play with him and Shungen is left alone.
He feels that what you said in the infirmary about taking care of him was a lie, so he becomes disillusioned and moves away from you.
